summary: Adds Open Lock spells to the game reminiscent of the ones found in Oblivion. The spells come in five levels: Novice, Apprentice, Adept, Expert, and Master, and their tomes can be bought from traders or found in random loot.
descriptionHtml:
Update June 4, 2013: Version 2.0 is out! Works with all mods and DLC. Get it here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36897

*** DESCRIPTION ***
***********************

Adds Open Lock spells to the game reminiscent of the ones found in Oblivion. The spells come in five levels: Novice, Apprentice, Adept, Expert, and Master, and their tomes can be bought from traders or found in random loot.

*** INSTALLATION ***
*************************

Extract LeazerOpenLock.esp and LeazerOpenLock.bsa to your Skyrim/Data folder

*** CHANGE LOG ***
***********************

0.01 - Initial release
0.02 - Fixed the bug where lower-leveled spells could unlock higher-leveled locks
0.03 - Minor update

*** NOTE ***
**************

 This mod adds a script to every door and most containers in the game. It will likely cause compatibility issues with other mods that modify doors and containers. I don\'t want to deter you from using my mod, but be warned. If in the future you download a new mod that modifies doors and/or containers and you encounter incompatibilities, suspect this mod first. Otherwise, I think the mod itself works pretty well and I hope you enjoy it.
author: Leazer
